# The furnace has successfully smelted a total of 3 iron plates from the iron ore, and it is still operational with 4 coal remaining.
# Now that I have enough iron plates, I can craft additional entities or components as needed.

# Let's check the current inventory to see how many iron plates I have in total.
total_iron_plates = inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate]  # Get the total number of iron plates produced.
print(f"Total iron plates in inventory: {total_iron_plates}")  # Display the total number of iron plates.

# I can now use these iron plates to craft more advanced items or entities. 
# For example, I could craft an electric mining drill or other components depending on my goals.

# First, I will check the recipe for the Electric Mining Drill to see what materials I need.
recipe_electric_mining_drill = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.ElectricMiningDrill)
print(recipe_electric_mining_drill)  # Display the recipe for the Electric Mining Drill.

# If I have the required materials, I will proceed to craft it. 
# I will also check my inventory to ensure I have enough resources for crafting. 
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.
